Articles.Content:
Last time my dad was in town he was excited to try this stuff out but we never got around to hitting up the brewery because, well, because a three-year old's birthday is a pretty tiring thing. Anyway, I was getting some libations for myself today at the local growler fillers and noticed this guy sitting on the counter.

![ckfQJ21.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/ckfQJ21.jpg)

Pretty gimmicky but I'll shell out $20 USD for my dad any day.
